text: Warning Sign is a 1985 American science fiction horror movie directed by Hal Barwood and starring Sam Waterston, Kathleen Quinlan, Yaphet Kotto, Jeffrey DeMunn. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 science fiction movies Category:1985 horror movies Category:1980s science fiction horror movies Category:American science fiction horror movies
title: Warning Sign (movie)
